channel.title: Cell Classification on Khayrul Islam
channel.description: Recent content in Cell Classification on Khayrul Islam

item.title: MIML: Multiplex Image Machine Learning for High Precision Cell Classification via Mechanical Traits within Microfluidic Systems
item.description: This paper introduces the MIML framework that combines label-free cell images with biomechanical data to achieve high precision in cell classification, improving specificity for white blood and tumor cells.

item.title: Lymphocyte Cell Classification using Knowledge Distillation and Transfer Learning
item.description: Developing an efficient model for lymphocyte cell classification using Knowledge Distillation and Transfer Learning, with real-time deployment on FPGA for T-cell detection.
